comment: Very disappointing class.  Syllabus stated 8 homework, 8 quizzes, 2 exams.  we had 4 homework, 2 quizzes and 1 exam.  very disorganized class.  didn't learn anything.  stay away. Never responds to emails.  must contact in person during sporadic office hours.

Took This Guy in the summer of 2009 And He was Very late in returning me my Grade, as a result he promised that I would get a B in the class but ended up giving me a C. Professor(if your reading this) you know who I am.

He is an ok professor. Funny and laid back but doesn't get his points across that well. The tests a pretty hard. He is also really slow at returning grades. The material is already pretty boring and he wasn't very good at making it interesting.

This is my 3rd class with this teacher (I had him for CS 1301 and IT 1324).  However, this class is an Ethics class, and it is SOO EASY.  He basically said "if you put forth a lil effort, and do the final paper, you will get an A".  Hes a great guy, funny, and I would recommend him
Not a good professor if you want to learn. Very laid back and a nice guy, but horrible at teaching material.
ok professor. material was kinda tedious & test were crazy hard.
Helpful guy, just sometimes has trouble trying to get his point across.  Overall wants his students to learn, has a great attitude, and is extremely helpful.  Take him if you can
Did not know the material very well and couldn't even answer some of his own questions. If you want to take a class to learn, I recommend you look elsewhere.
Great teacher, laid back, and is extremely helpful to students.  I did not like Java programming, but he knew I was struggling and helped me through it.
Only if you need credit or want to pass; Do not take his class if you want to acturally learn something, complete waste of time; not college level.
Very fun Professor, always in a good mood. Projects are fairly easy and he will help you anytime if you just ask.
Very laid back professor.  Speaks slowly sometimes but you can go no wrong if you take class.  A recommended professor.
Did not get as much as I wanted out of the class but overall he is helpful and easy going.
Easy going. Fun class. Takes a round about way to make a point. Grading is tough. On the whole had enjoyable session.

An easy B at least.  For some reason I got the idea that he didn't know exactly what he was doing.  However, he is a very nice and fun professor.  You will have to read the book often though to keep up.

He's very cool and laid back.  Tests are easy (more or less).  As stated earlier, do the labs and projects (which are usually easy) and you will get a B for sure.  Classes kinda drag b/c it seems to take him a long time to get his point across. You'll see
Show up and get an A.  Friendly and helpful.

This teacher is an easy A.  All u have to do is come to his class, and he is nice so the classes are usually fun and time flies.  Your HW is worth 60% of your grade do all your home work and come to class and u will get a B.
Easy but boring.
Knows and communicates material very well
